p: Azulene scaffold can be encountered among compounds isolated from Salvia miltiorrhiza var. alba roots, which are used in traditional Chinese medicine. Ma et al. evaluated the anti-inflammatory activities of tanshinones isolated from Salvia miltiorrhiza var. alba roots in THP-1 macrophages [ 42]. These compounds have been applied in the treatment of cardiovascular diseases in local clinical practice. Hexahydrotrimethylnaphthoazulenedione 13 showed anti-inflammatory potency to inhibit the production of TNF-α, IL-1β, and IL-8 in lipopolysaccharide-activated THP-1 macrophages (Fig. 6).
